name: Running Cats - Survive The Free Kitty Cat Simulator
name_original: Running Cats - Survive The Free Kitty Cat Simulator
description:
This a game about love and cats! Little puppy cats and cute kitties are always fun to play with. Pick out and adopt your purr and perfect pet. 
Your puppy is the most cute kitty of the neighborhood but of course there are other lovely kitties to play with in your city. You are an animal lover who like to stroke your pet.
Unfortunately, some of this cats are jealous of your puppy. All of them are cute cats who love to be stroked and, therefore, they are willing to live your puppy ´s life. 
For this reason, he will need to compete for your attention and participate in tonight´s race with other jealous puppies. Some cute kitties are already on their run to you. 
You will need to dodge these kitties who think that during the night you will confuse them with your kitty. Concentrate on your kitten and focus on a  race with no limits.

Avoid every cat who want to confuse you and keep confident in the race. Prove that you and your pet are best partners in this animal game. Be quick...All the animals are waiting for you!

Meow! Cute Kitty Puppy Cat is an addicting animal game which is safe to play. This funny game shows you that pets can be your best friends: animals are fun too!
 Try it now and practice your skills on animal racing.

- Family-friendly game with 4 different kitten
- Scenario: City streets at night
- More levels, more running, more fun!
- Different features of this funny game will allow you to speed up or slow down

Choose one kitty and start racing with your pet!
Beat the record, compete with your friends and share your results via Facebook, Twitter and Google+.

Twitter: @bravocterogames
Facebook: www.facebook.com/bravocterogames
